response.original_title: WatchWord Bible: The Gospel of Matthew
response.overview: The best known of the four Gospels, Matthew gives an inspired, unforgettable account of Jesus’ life, with some of the most famous, influential words ever recorded, including Jesus’ Sermon on the Mount, Olivet Discourse and Great Commission. This Gospel pays particular attention to how Jesus fulfilled amazing Old Testament prophecies about the coming of the Jews’ Messiah made over 20 centuries - from his miraculous birth through his death and resurrection.
response.title: WatchWord Bible: The Gospel of Matthew
